title.en-US: Voice Reader - Multilingual Text to Speech

short_description.default: Convert text to speech in multiple Indian languages
short_description.en-US: A powerful text-to-speech app supporting multiple Indian languages

full_description.default:
Voice Reader is a versatile text-to-speech application that supports multiple Indian languages including Tamil, Hindi, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada, Bengali, and Gujarati, along with English.

Features:
• Support for 8 languages
• Read text from direct input
• Import text from URLs
• File reading support
• Adjustable speech rate and pitch
• Simple and intuitive interface
• No ads
• Offline support for basic features

Perfect for:
• Students learning languages
• People with visual impairments
• Content creators
• Anyone who prefers listening to reading

release_notes.default: Initial release of Voice Reader with support for 8 languages
release_notes.en-US: Initial release of Voice Reader with support for 8 languages
